name: Tears Fall Low
description:
"Unravel the mystery of a fallen tear on its journey back to the surface!"

Tears Fall Low is a mesmerizing 2D platformer filled with inventive mechanics and challenging gameplay. Explore a rich and diverse world, as you climb out of dark caverns towards the surface!



As a fallen tear, embark on a journey through the hidden depths of the Earth, overcoming terrible perils. Each area holds its own secrets and dangers, presenting unique obstacles and challenges that test your skills and wit.



Unlock your true potential as you progress through the game, and face the formidable monsters beneath the surface. Delve deep into a simple but captivating story that unfolds in unexpected and strange ways...



  • Mysterious and Engaging World
  • Challenging Platforming
  • Intriguing Story with Captivating Themes
